name: 3 Mmm Tree Coffee Deli
address: 874B Morris Park Ave, Bronx, NY 10462, USA

reviews.text: Food is decent, nothing to brag about. You must be Hispanic to get treated right and not overcharged. I was overcharged and when I complained about it, they had private sidebars in Spanish. Overall, I don‚Äôt like how they make a non-hispanic‚Ä¶

I strongly recommend avoiding this place. The cleanliness was very poor, and the service particularly from one older staff member was extremely disappointing. Overall, it was not a good experience.

Apart from great customer service. They have delicious Mexican food. The Al Pastor torta was 10/10, one of the best tortas I have ever had. They also have seating with AC to enjoy your food.

Hands down the best takeout spot in a couple mile radius. Owned and operated by people who have a long resume in fine cooking and it shows! - fresh ingredients cooked with care.
